            self, worker_id, d, cur_language, cur_country, cur_role,
            cur_login, cur_password):
        """

            "55", "ReTests of Manual Detected Bugs",
            "324",

            "in the menu section [Trading] is not displayed in the header when AR language is selected",
            False, False
